content: As a high school teacher, I deal with the for profit colleges preying on students all the time.  No matter how much I educate, plead and be them NOT to attend these schools, they go anyway.  Nothing I can say can compete with the slick sales presentation these kids go through.  They counter my arguments with such sales lines as, public colleges make you take courses that are not related to your career choice. Of course, they come back a year or two later with no degree and totally perplexed as to why they cannot transfer their credits to a legit college.
